_$about: All keys in this file should be sorted alphabetically

contact.github: You can find us on GitHub at: [rodekruis/cash-program-design-wizard](https://github.com/rodekruis/cash-program-design-wizard/)
contact.intro: If you have any questions or experience bugs or issues, let us know.
contact.label: Contact

login-page.introduction: Welcome to the Cash Program Design Wizard.

browser.explanation:
To be able to use the app easily and efficiently, a recent version of a browser is required.
 Internet Explorer 11 is unfortunately not supported.

connectivity.explanation:
After log-in it is possible to '_go offline_' and work without an active internet-connection, storing your work locally on you own computer.
 When connected or when '_going online_', changes will be saved to the server automatically.

notification.offline: You currently seem to be offline, your answers are saved locally and will be uploaded when you get back online later.
notification.sync-done: Your locally saved answers are stored on the server.

select-n.placeholder: Select 1 or more from the list

question-section.no-questions: No questions available with the current filters.
